name: Meme Media
tagline: Graphic Design Agency Based in Bolton
description: We’re meme media, a graphic design and media agency from Bolton, just outside of Manchester. We offer a range of services ranging from video to SEO, we love what we do and can make a real difference to your business. We start by getting to know you, then we taylor a plan to maximise your marketing budget. We have been helping our clients to grow for over 10 years now, and we’d love to work with you too.
